title: Vuelta a España stage 7: Geoffrey Soupe stuns favorites with sprint win in chaotic crash-riddled final
content:
Evenepoel, Jumbo-Visma, UAE Emirates' GC racers cruise through sprinter stage, Ineos Grenadiers loses Arensman to crash.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España stage 7: Geoffrey Soupe stuns favorites with sprint win in chaotic crash-riddled final on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
